categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns
Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text: The Battle of Half-Axe Pass was a battle that took place on the planet of New Plympto as part of the Galactic Empire's campaign to kill the planet's Nosaurian population. During the battle, Jedi Master Dass Jennir aided the New Plympto resistance, fighting alongside his friend Bomo Greenbark, one of the Nosaurians. The pair were the only members of the resistance to survive the battle, as the other Nosaurians were killed in the fighting or executed after surrendering.
